response.original_title: Natural Another / ナチュラル Another
response.overview: In “Teacher’s Pet (Body and Soul)”, the sequel to “Natural”, the secret relationship between Chitose and her art teacher Haruhiko continues. However, this risky relationship no longer takes place completely in secret because fellow teacher Tagami, of all people, has found out about it – and what’s more, she has feelings for her colleague Haruhiko too! How will she deal with this knowledge and her own desire to be close to Haruhiko?
response.tagline: The secret relationship between Chitose and her art teacher Haruhiko continues.
response.title: Teacher's Pet (Body And Soul)
